metadata.title: CVE-2015-9262 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
_XcursorThemeInherits in library.c in libXcursor before 1.1.15 allowsremote attackers to cause denial of service or potentially code executionvia a one-byte heap overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9262` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxcursor1 - 1:1.1.14-1ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxcursor package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.1.14-1ubuntu0.16.04.2').
